title: Commuting Subalgebras of Affine Super Yangians Arising from Edge Contractions
summary: In the previous paper, we constructed two kinds of edge contractions for the affine super Yangian and a homomorphism from the affine super Yangian to the universal enveloping algebra of a $W$-superalgebra of type $A$. In this article, we show that these two edge contractions commute with each other. As an application, we give a homomorphism from the affine super Yangian to some centralizer algebras of the universal enveloping algebra of $W$-superalgebras of type $A$. Using the edge contraction, we also show the compatibility of the coproduct for the affine super Yangian with the parabolic induction for a $W$-superalgebra of type $A$ in some special cases.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了仿射超Yangian的两种边收缩操作可交换，并应用于构造到A型W-超代数中心化子代数的同态，以及在某些特殊情况下展示余积与抛物诱导的兼容性。
AI.motivation: 在前一篇论文中，作者已经构造了仿射超Yangian的两种边收缩操作以及到A型W-超代数泛包络代数的同态。本文旨在进一步研究这两种边收缩操作之间的关系，并探索其在W-超代数理论中的应用。
AI.method: 作者证明了两种边收缩操作之间的交换性，利用这一性质构造了从仿射超Yangian到A型W-超代数中心化子代数的同态映射。同时，通过边收缩操作展示了在某些特殊情况下，仿射超Yangian的余积与W-超代数的抛物诱导之间的兼容性。
AI.result: 成功证明了两种边收缩操作是可交换的，建立了从仿射超Yangian到W-超代数中心化子代数的同态，并在特定条件下验证了余积与抛物诱导的兼容性。
AI.conclusion: 本文深化了对仿射超Yangian与W-超代数之间关系的理解，证明了边收缩操作的重要性质，并为后续研究提供了新的工具和视角，特别是在表示论和代数结构方面的应用。

title: Quantum cluster algebra, braid moves and quantum virtual Grothendieck ring
comment: This paper is accepted to Selecta Mathematica
summary:
In this paper, we study the quantum virtual Grothendieck ring, denoted by $\frakK_q(\g)$, which was introduced in [39], and further investigated in [26, 25]. Our approach involves examining this ring from two perspectives: first, by considering its connection to quantum cluster algebras of non-skew-symmetric types; and second, by exploring its relevance to categorification theory. We specifically focus on (i) the homomorphisms that arise from braid moves, particularly 4-moves and 6-moves, in the braid group; and (ii) the quantum Laurent positivity phenomena, which has not yet been proven for non-skew-symmetric types.
  As applications of our results, we derive the substitution formulas for non-skew-symmetric types discussed in [11] for skew-symmetric types, and demonstrate that any truncated element in a heart subring, denoted by $\frakK_{q,Q}(\g)$, which corresponds to a simple module over the quiver Hecke algebra $R^\g$, possesses coefficients in $\Z_{\ge 0}[q^{\pm 1/2}]$. This result is particularly interesting because it implies that each truncated Kirillov--Reshetikhin polynomial in $\frakK_{q,Q}(\g)$ and each element in the standard basis $\sfE_q(\g)$ of the entire ring $\frakK_q(\g)$ have coefficients also in $\Z_{\ge 0}[q^{\pm 1/2}]$.
  Since (truncated) Kirillov--Reshetikhin polynomials can be obtained using a quantum cluster algebra algorithm and appear as quantum cluster variables, they provide compelling evidence in support of the quantum Laurent positivity conjecture in non-skew-symmetric types.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了量子虚拟格罗腾迪克环，从量子簇代数和范畴化理论两个角度探讨其在非斜对称类型中的应用，重点分析了辫群中的同态映射和量子洛朗正性现象。
AI.motivation: 研究量子虚拟格罗腾迪克环在非斜对称类型中的性质，特别是量子洛朗正性现象尚未在非斜对称类型中得到证明，需要从量子簇代数和范畴化理论两个角度深入探索。
AI.method: 通过两个视角研究：1) 量子簇代数与非斜对称类型的联系；2) 范畴化理论的相关性。重点分析辫群中辫移动（特别是4-移动和6-移动）产生的同态，以及量子洛朗正性现象。
AI.result: 推导出非斜对称类型的替换公式，证明心子环中的截断元素系数属于Z≥0[q±1/2]，截断的Kirillov-Reshetikhin多项式和标准基元素系数也在该集合中，为量子洛朗正性猜想提供了有力证据。
AI.conclusion: 量子虚拟格罗腾迪克环的研究为理解非斜对称类型的量子簇代数提供了新视角，截断的Kirillov-Reshetikhin多项式作为量子簇变量，为量子洛朗正性猜想在非斜对称类型中的成立提供了重要证据。

title: Duality in Monoidal Categories
comment: 34 pages. Final version. To appear in Mathematische Zeitschrift
summary: We compare closed and rigid monoidal categories. Closedness is defined by the tensor product having a right adjoint: the internal hom functor. Rigidity, on the other hand, generalises the duality of finite-dimensional vector spaces. In the latter, the internal hom functor is implemented by tensoring with the respective duals. This raises the question: can one decide whether a closed monoidal category is rigid, simply by verifying that the internal hom is tensor-representable? We provide a counterexample in terms of the category of sl2-crystals. As a byproduct, we obtain characterisations of the Grothendieck-Verdier duality and rigidity of functor categories endowed with Day convolution as their tensor product. This has various applications, three of which we study in detail: generalisations of quasi-Frobenius algebras, called QF-2 algebras; Mackey functors, where we prove that, as expected due to work of Bouc, an object being rigidly dualisable is equivalent to it being finitely-generated projective; and crossed modules of finite groups, where we associate to each of these objects a Grothendieck-Verdier category of group-graded representations.

AI.tldr: 论文探讨了闭幺半范畴与刚性幺半范畴的关系，通过sl2-晶体范畴的反例证明内部hom的张量可表示性不能决定刚性，并给出了Day卷积函子范畴中Grothendieck-Verdier对偶和刚性的刻画。
AI.motivation: 闭幺半范畴（张量积有右伴随：内部hom函子）和刚性幺半范畴（推广有限维向量空间的对偶性）之间存在概念联系。在刚性范畴中，内部hom可以通过与对偶张量来实现，这引发了一个问题：是否可以通过验证内部hom是否张量可表示来判断闭幺半范畴是否刚性？
AI.method: 使用sl2-晶体范畴作为反例，证明内部hom的张量可表示性不足以决定刚性。同时研究Day卷积张量积下的函子范畴，刻画其Grothendieck-Verdier对偶和刚性条件。
AI.result: 1. 提供了sl2-晶体范畴的反例，证明闭幺半范畴中内部hom的张量可表示性不能保证刚性；2. 获得了Day卷积函子范畴中Grothendieck-Verdier对偶和刚性的特征描述；3. 应用于三个具体领域：QF-2代数推广、Mackey函子（证明刚性对偶等价于有限生成投射）、有限群交叉模（构造群分次表示的Grothendieck-Verdier范畴）。
AI.conclusion: 闭幺半范畴的刚性不能仅通过内部hom的张量可表示性来判断，需要更精细的条件。Day卷积框架为研究函子范畴的对偶性提供了有力工具，并在代数表示论和范畴论中有广泛应用。
